title: Cult Mom Lori Vallow/Hubby Chad Daybell Scheming Revealed
itunes:title: Cult Mom Lori Vallow/Hubby Chad Daybell Scheming Revealed
description:
As Lori Vallow's brother, Adam Cox, opens up about their familial relationships, the lengths that Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell were willing to go, are being revealed. This included text message and email revelations that Chad Daybell said his wife Tammy, would be killed in a car crash. Also new in this case, a judge ruled that Lori Vallow Daybell’s privately hired attorney can no longer represent her. Mark means, according to District Judge Steven Boyce, has a conflict of interest after previously representing Chad Daybell in another case.


Joining Nancy Grace Today:

  • Kathryn Marsh - Special Victims Liaison for the State’s Attorneys Office (Charles County, MD), Co-Founder: Right Response Consulting, "No Grey Zone" Podcast", www.rightresponseconsulting.com, Instagram/Twitter @nogreyzoneRRC
  • Caryn Stark - NYC Psychologist, www.carynstark.com, Twitter: @carynpsych, Facebook: "Caryn Stark"
  • Joe Scott Morgan - Professor of Forensics: Jacksonville State University, Author, "Blood Beneath My Feet", Host: "Body Bags with Joseph Scott Morgan"
  • Nate Eaton - News Director, EastIdahoNews.com Twitter: @NateNewsNow, Instagram: @n.eaton

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
